data: At one o’clock in the afternoon of a spring day in the year 1868, a young man of twenty-seven, carelessly and shabbily dressed, was toiling up the back staircase of a five-storied house on Officers Street in St. Petersburg.
Officers Street | St. Petersburg | back staircase | five-storied house
1868 | spring day | one o’clock in the afternoon
Turgenev, Ivan Sergeevich, 1818-1883; Townsend, R. S. [Translator]
